metadata.title: CVE-2024-26610 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:iwlwifi: fix a memory corruption iwl_fw_ini_trigger_tlv::data is a pointerto a __le32, which means that if we copy to iwl_fw_ini_trigger_tlv::data +offset while offset is in bytes, we'll write past the buffer.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
